subject: Standard Operating Procedures for completion of GST Special Audit of Change in Law in Time-Bound Manner in respect of HAM Projects - reg.
text: MRah 7y rTHNf gifeabrut (Tec5 4Rdev & R1THFT HATT4,  HRa TraSR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) Hrula Td 011-5 Q 6, 7a27-10, ERaFl, T fievlt 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 /Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAI Policy Guidelines/ Accounts & Taxesl 2024 Policy Circular No.3.3.33/2024 dated 12th November , 2024 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/FGA/GST-2021-22/SM-Vol. IV (Comp. No. 92140)} Sub: Standard Operating Procedures for completion of GST Special Audit of Change in Law in Time-Bound Manner in respect of HAM Projects reg: Goods and Service Tax Act, 2017 has been implemented in India W.e.f. 01.07.2017. The Act has subsumed various Indirect Taxes of both the Central & State Governments such as Central Excise   Duty, Service   Tax, Central Sales Tax   (CST) Works   Contract Tax (WCT) /State Value Added Tax (VAT), Additional Custom Duty (CVD) and Special Additional Duty (SAD) apart from Entry Tax and Octroi Charges etc 2 The implementation of GST became an event of "Change in Law" as applicable under various types of Contracts as Awarded by NHAI. Since its inception, GST Act has been amended from time to time resulting in Change in Taxation of various types of Road Projects. 3 Accordingly, NHAI have from time to time issued various SOPs, Policy Circulars, etc. to down the Procedure and Guidelines for the Contractors/ Concessionaires to claim the incremental/ differential cost of GST due to Change in Law: 4 In order to streamline the process, NHAI had interalia laid down the mechanism of Special Audit to verify the claim for payment of GST under Change in Law of HAM Projects. However , NHAI has received representations from Stakeholders regarding delay in forwarding the proposal by IE/PD to process further and complete the necessary Audit to finalize the claims of Concessionaires. 5_ In order to expedite the process of Audit and finalize the claim of Change in Law of Annexure-IV of HAM Projects in a timely manner, the following timelines are being suggested to be followed by the concerned involved: S.No. Activities Days Remarks Concessionaire submits proposal in Annexure- Start Date Duly signed IV to HO GST Cell with certification of prescribed Excel amounts mentioned in Annexure-IV from templates along Statutory Auditor of the Project with Documents as per check list. 2 HO GST Cell appoints GST Auditor 3 On Verification of basic claim documents Contd: 21 - M 7 71 91 NHAI 319 , lay along
